Tracksoar
=================

Tracksoar is an open-source APRS tracker, for which the documentation and code is located in the following
locations:

* https://www.tracksoar.com/
* https://github.com/slapplebags/Tracksoar-Firmware

The code present in the CODENAME repository is a slight modification of the Tracksoar source, forked after
approximately commit ``cf675f5b4e888f5521e9e35a9e195c8e107f2592``.

Tracksoar is licensed under GPLv2 or later, and thus CODENAME is licensed under GPLv3 or later.
